name: Redex Adventure
description:
"Redex Adventure" is a Google Dinosaur Game-Likes adventure game platform

Press W and S to jump and crouch to dodge monsters, you can also use the number keys 1 2 3 to switch the color of the character, and attack the monster with the same color as the character at the right time to get more points!

　◆　Support Traditional Chinese, English, Japanese, languages!

　◆　 "Standard Mode", "Speedrun Mode" and "Boss Mode" are waiting for you to challenge!


　◆　With local leaderboards, confirm your best record at any time!

This is the first time I've made it with Unity and put it on the shelves.If you like this game, please leave your thoughts in the questionnaire on the creator page

(from google translate)
